notes:
[Whirler Rogue] is by far the best card in this pack. 4 power and toughness for 4 is a great rate and the ability is just great as well.

The runner up is probably [Thopter Engineer] but it's reasonably close between that and [Ghirapur Gearcrafter]. The 1/3 body is relevant, and giving all of your Thopters haste is pretty relevant as well.
